items.sentence: Our fire alarm sometimes goes off when my mother is cooking something in the kitchen.
She spends a pretty good chunk of time just sitting there and looking out the window.
Some healthcare workers spend more time doing paperwork than taking care of patients.
I\'ve just spoken to your French teacher and he says you\'re doing well in his class.
Tom told Mary to put the hammer back into the toolbox when she was finished using it.
Tom took me to a restaurant where you can eat as much as you want for thirty dollars.
Tom volunteered a good deal of his time to helping those less fortunate than himself.
Tom was waiting for someone to do that for him, but no one did, so he did it himself.
Tom\'s parents allow him to do a lot of things that my parents don\'t allow me to do.
The guy driving the truck that crashed into our car didn\'t have a driver\'s license.
I hope you know that the last thing I want to do is go there without your permission.
Tom certainly wouldn\'t be anywhere near as rich as he is if he hadn\'t married Mary.
Tom likes both Mary and Alice and can\'t decide who to ask to the dance this weekend.
Tom opened a new restaurant, but it didn\'t turn a profit in the first twelve months.
After Tom had eaten everything on his plate, he asked Mary if he could eat her salad.
Everybody was obeying the speed limit, so I knew there was likely a speed trap ahead.
Tom and Mary both wanted to go to Boston, but neither of them could get the time off.
Tom is the first guy Mary has really been interested in since she broke up with John.
Tom played a Spanish folk tune on his English horn at a Chinese restaurant in France.
Tom pulled out some necklaces from his bag and told Mary to choose the one she liked.
